slides.title: Trigonometric Ratios
slides.content:
**In a right triangle with angle θ:**

**sin θ = Opposite / Hypotenuse**
**cos θ = Adjacent / Hypotenuse**
**tan θ = Opposite / Adjacent**

**Reciprocals:**
**cosec θ = 1/sin θ**
**sec θ = 1/cos θ**
**cot θ = 1/tan θ**

slides.title: Fundamental Identities
slides.content:
**Pythagorean Identities:**

**sin²θ + cos²θ = 1**

**1 + tan²θ = sec²θ**

**1 + cot²θ = cosec²θ**

These are fundamental and must be memorized!

slides.title: Angle Sum Formulas
slides.content:
**sin(A + B) = sinA cosB + cosA sinB**

**sin(A - B) = sinA cosB - cosA sinB**

**cos(A + B) = cosA cosB - sinA sinB**

**cos(A - B) = cosA cosB + sinA sinB**

**tan(A + B) = (tanA + tanB)/(1 - tanA tanB)**
